map.name: The Grand Dueling Tournament II
map.objective: Defeat opposing teams in The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament!

contributor.contribution: Grandmaster of PGM, XML, and existence itself
Submarine, Balloon - Sky Traffic design inspiration

filter.id: all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=1, current_kit=3, all-arenas)

apply.message: You may not modify that block
You may not modify that block

message.text: `7`oFrom `6${host-name}`r: Return to the arena observing zone to exit spectator mode

trigger.filter: all(participating, state=${running}, playing=0, spectator_mode=0, not(all-spectators), not(all-arenas-finished), not(lobby))
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=0, spectator_mode=0, lobby)
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=0, spectator_mode=0, arena-1-spectator, arena-1-finished, not(all-arenas-finished))
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=0, spectator_mode=0, arena-2-spectator, arena-2-finished, not(all-arenas-finished))
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=0, spectator_mode=0, arena-3-spectator, arena-3-finished, not(all-arenas-finished))
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=0, spectator_mode=0, arena-4-spectator, arena-4-finished, not(all-arenas-finished))

case.filter: any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[0]=1), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[2]=1), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[4]=1), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[6]=1))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[0]=2), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[2]=2), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[4]=2), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[6]=2))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[0]=3), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[2]=3), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[4]=3), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[6]=3))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[0]=4), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[2]=4), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[4]=4), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[6]=4))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[0]=5), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[2]=5), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[4]=5), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[6]=5))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[0]=6), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[2]=6), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[4]=6), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[6]=6))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[0]=7), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[2]=7), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[4]=7), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[6]=7))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[0]=8), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[2]=8), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[4]=8), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[6]=8))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[1]=1), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[3]=1), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[5]=1), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[7]=1))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[1]=2), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[3]=2), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[5]=2), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[7]=2))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[1]=3), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[3]=3), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[5]=3), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[7]=3))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[1]=4), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[3]=4), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[5]=4), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[7]=4))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[1]=5), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[3]=5), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[5]=5), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[7]=5))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[1]=6), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[3]=6), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[5]=6), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[7]=6))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[1]=7), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[3]=7), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[5]=7), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[7]=7))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_matchups[1]=8), all(all-arena-2, arena_matchups[3]=8), all(all-arena-3, arena_matchups[5]=8), all(all-arena-4, arena_matchups[7]=8))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_finished[0]=1), all(all-arena-2, arena_finished[1]=1), all(all-arena-3, arena_finished[2]=1), all(all-arena-4, arena_finished[3]=1))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_finished[0]=2), all(all-arena-2, arena_finished[1]=2), all(all-arena-3, arena_finished[2]=2), all(all-arena-4, arena_finished[3]=2))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_finished[0]=3), all(all-arena-2, arena_finished[1]=3), all(all-arena-3, arena_finished[2]=3), all(all-arena-4, arena_finished[3]=3))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_finished[0]=4), all(all-arena-2, arena_finished[1]=4), all(all-arena-3, arena_finished[2]=4), all(all-arena-4, arena_finished[3]=4))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_finished[0]=5), all(all-arena-2, arena_finished[1]=5), all(all-arena-3, arena_finished[2]=5), all(all-arena-4, arena_finished[3]=5))

any(all(all-arena-1, arena_finished[0]=7), all(all-arena-2, arena_finished[1]=7), all(all-arena-3, arena_finished[2]=7), all(all-arena-4, arena_finished[3]=7))
any(all(all-arena-1, arena_finished[0]=8), all(all-arena-2, arena_finished[1]=8), all(all-arena-3, arena_finished[2]=8), all(all-arena-4, arena_finished[3]=8))

trigger.filter: all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=1, current_kit_requires_survival=1, all-arenas)

message.text: {"text": "`7`oFrom `6${host-name}`r: Psst, have you heard about the super secret settings? ","extra":[{"text":" [Let me see] ","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/action trigger kit-console-intro"},"color":"blue"}],"color": "white"}

`7`oFrom `6${host-name}`r: Use the controls below to change the ${kit-noun} for each round. `b[1]`r indicates that the ${kit-noun} is currently selected for the corresponding `3[Round]`r. Here are the available ${kit-noun}s for this tournament:

{"text": "","extra":[{"text":" [1] ","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"text":"Round 1","color":"dark_aqua"}},"color":"dark_aqua"},{"text":"[2] ","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"text":"Round 2","color":"dark_aqua"}},"color":"dark_aqua"},{"text":"[3]","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"text":"Round 3","color":"dark_aqua"}},"color":"dark_aqua"}],"color": "white"}

{"text": "","extra":[{"text":" {r1} ","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/action trigger set-round-1-kit-{num}"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"text":"Set `3Round 1 `b${kit-noun} to {kit}","color":"aqua"}},"color":"aqua"},{"text":"{r2} ","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/action trigger set-round-2-kit-{num}"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"text":"Set `3Round 2 `b${kit-noun} to {kit}","color":"aqua"}},"color":"aqua"},{"text":"{r3}","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/action trigger set-round-3-kit-{num}"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"text":"Set `3Round 3 `b${kit-noun} to {kit}","color":"aqua"}},"color":"aqua"},{"text":" : {kit}"}],"color":"white"}

{"text": " `bIntroduction `r: ","extra":[{"text":"{state}"}],"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/action trigger toggle-intro"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"text":"`bToggle whether `6${host-name} `bdoes prematch introductions."}}}

{"text": " `bDebug Messages `r: ","extra":[{"text":"{state}"}],"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/action trigger toggle-debug"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":{"text":"`bPrint debug messages in chat."}}}
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: The ${kit-noun} for round {round} has been set to {kit}`r!
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: Welcome to The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament!
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: In this Swiss tournament you will ${tournament-action} against teams with the same number of wins.
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: Each round you will use {announce_0} ${kit-noun} to ${tournament-action} your way to victory with!
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: {announce_0} ${kit-noun} will be {kit}`r!
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: In the second round your ${kit-noun} will be {kit}`r!
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: And for the grand finale the ${kit-noun} will be {kit}`r!
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: {announce_1}{p} `aRound {round} `r{announce_2} in `a${round-begin-seconds} seconds`r!
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: Use this time to rearrange your inventory to your liking!
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: {announce_0}
{ translate: 'broadcast.gameOver.teamWon', color: 'green' }
message.subtitle: { translate: 'broadcast.gameOver.teamWon', color: 'green' }

switch-scope.filter: all(won=0, any(all(index=0, arena-1-teams), all(index=1, arena-2-teams), all(index=2, arena-3-teams), all(index=3, arena-4-teams)))

message.text: { translate: 'broadcast.gameOver.teamLost', color: 'red' }
message.subtitle: { translate: 'broadcast.gameOver.teamLost', color: 'red' }

message.text: `7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: {winner} `rhas defeated {loser}`r!

trigger.filter: all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=0, spectator_mode=0, any(lobby, all(arena-1, arena-1-finished), all(arena-2, arena-2-finished), all(arena-3, arena-3-finished), all(arena-4, arena-4-finished)))
all(match-running, state=${running}, round-running-delay, not(arena-1-finished), placement-1-team, not(arena-1-has-players))
all(match-running, state=${running}, round-running-delay, not(arena-2-finished), placement-3-team, not(arena-2-has-players))
all(match-running, state=${running}, round-running-delay, not(arena-3-finished), placement-5-team, not(arena-3-has-players))
all(match-running, state=${running}, round-running-delay, not(arena-4-finished), placement-7-team, not(arena-4-has-players))

message.text: `7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: Congratulations {team} `ron winning The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament!
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: Alright, this is taking far too long...
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: Remaining players have had their health reduced to 1 heart!
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: Let's make this sudden death a little... `cexplosive`r!
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: The platforms have been connected by a bridge!

after.message: The middle will become buildable in {0}

message.text: `7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: You can now build between the platforms!
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: Alright, this is taking far too long...
`7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name}`r: The first team to reach the `agreen safe zone `rwins the round!

trigger.filter: all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=1, alive, progress-1-exclusive)
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=1, alive, progress-2-exclusive)
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=1, alive, progress-3-exclusive)
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=1, alive, progress-4-exclusive)
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, playing=1, alive, progress-5-exclusive)

switch-scope.filter: any(all(temp=1, all-arena-1), all(temp=2, all-arena-2), all(temp=3, all-arena-3), all(temp=4, all-arena-4))

message.text: {team} `7captured `r{color}{hill}

switch-scope.filter: all(playing=1, any(all(temp=1, arena-1-teams), all(temp=2, arena-2-teams), all(temp=3, arena-3-teams), all(temp=4, arena-4-teams)))

trigger.filter: all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, all-arenas, playing=1, alive)

message.text: `7[`6${host-title}`7] `6${host-name} `7has enabled the `a`lBlitz `7mutation

portal.forward: all(match-running, participating, any(state=${running}, all(state=${starting}, teleport=1)), placement=1, alive, playing=1, not(respawns=0), not(any(all-arenas, below-arenas)))
all(match-running, participating, any(state=${running}, all(state=${starting}, teleport=1)), placement=2, alive, playing=1, not(respawns=0), not(any(all-arenas, below-arenas)))
all(match-running, participating, any(state=${running}, all(state=${starting}, teleport=1)), placement=3, alive, playing=1, not(respawns=0), not(any(all-arenas, below-arenas)))
all(match-running, participating, any(state=${running}, all(state=${starting}, teleport=1)), placement=4, alive, playing=1, not(respawns=0), not(any(all-arenas, below-arenas)))
all(match-running, participating, any(state=${running}, all(state=${starting}, teleport=1)), placement=5, alive, playing=1, not(respawns=0), not(any(all-arenas, below-arenas)))
all(match-running, participating, any(state=${running}, all(state=${starting}, teleport=1)), placement=6, alive, playing=1, not(respawns=0), not(any(all-arenas, below-arenas)))
all(match-running, participating, any(state=${running}, all(state=${starting}, teleport=1)), placement=7, alive, playing=1, not(respawns=0), not(any(all-arenas, below-arenas)))
all(match-running, participating, any(state=${running}, all(state=${starting}, teleport=1)), placement=8, alive, playing=1, not(respawns=0), not(any(all-arenas, below-arenas)))
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, round-running-delay, playing=0, goto=1)
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, round-running-delay, playing=0, goto=2)
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, round-running-delay, playing=0, goto=3)
all(match-running, participating, state=${running}, round-running-delay, playing=0, goto=4)
